member.name: M:D4EMNWISDataExtension.modStations.GetStationsInRegion(D4EMDataManager.Region,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Download NWIS stations within the specified region and save to a text RDB file
member.param: File name to save downloaded station information in

"discharge" = Surface Water: Daily streamflow "rt" = Real-time and Recent Daily Data "peak" = Surface Water: Peak streamflow "qw" = Water Quality "gw" = Ground Water "measurements" = streamflow measurements
